nodes.text: "Escape from Naboo" is a musical theme in the Star Wars prequels. It was composed by John Williams. In its original appearance on the Episode I soundtrack, it is 2 minutes and 4 seconds long.

The track is heard in each of the Star Wars prequels. In Episode I, it is heard when Queen Amidala's ship takes off from Naboo and passes the blockade and again in the last lap of the pod race between Anakin and Sebulba. In Episode II, a militartistic version of the theme is heard when the Jedi in the Geonosis arena are rescued by Yoda and the clone troopers. In Episode III, it is heard when the Invisible Hand, the flagship of General Grievous, is fired upon, gets heavily damaged and starts to plunge down into Coruscant.
"Escape from Naboo" is the main menu music for the 2002 video game Star Wars: Jedi Starfighter.

The piece is used in the 2003 video game Star Wars: The Clone Wars in "Mission 2: To the Arena" as you escort the Jedi to the Petranaki arena and in "Mission 4: The Evacuation of Rhen Var" as you first take flight in you gunship.
